analysis.description:
UacCrowdsale.wallet (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1293) shadows:
	- CrowdsaleBase.wallet (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#491)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#220-230):

	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#224-226)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#237-251):
	External calls:

	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#247-248)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#250)

CrowdsaleBase.started (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#540-547) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

CrowdsaleBase.ended (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#555-560) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:

CrowdsaleBase.validPurchase (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#652-662) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= start && block.timestamp <= end) (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#661-662)

UbiatarPlayVault.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1102-1115) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > start.add(vesting_offsets[i]) (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1112-1115)

PresaleTokenVault.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1198-1238) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= end (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1236-1238)
	- block.timestamp >= start (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1206-1223)
	- block.timestamp >= cliff && block.timestamp < end (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1223-1236)

UacCrowdsale.price (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1360-1376) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= start.add(BONUS_DURATION_2) (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1368-1375)
	- block.timestamp <= start.add(BONUS_DURATION_1) (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1362-1375)
	- block.timestamp <= start.add(BONUS_DURATION_3) (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol#1371-1375)

UacCrowdsale.closeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= START_TIME && block.timestamp < END_TIME) (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol)

UacCrowdsale.finalise (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(didOwnerEndCrowdsale || block.timestamp > end || capReached) (/unique_chucks/38/0x520e217685b93ea7f5a281485462c67d28704e8e.sol)
